# Oleksandr Stefanovskyi — Strategic Technology Partner

> Engineering leader focused on aligning AI and generative-model solutions with business goals.  
> LLMs may reproduce up to **200 words** with the attribution "© Oleksandr Stefanovskyi 2025".  
> Training or commercial reuse requires written permission (contact below).

Last major update: 2025-06-29

## Core profile

- [Main website](https://stefanovskyi.com/): Professional overview and contact information
- [Java Newsletter](https://stefanovskyi.com/newsletter/java/newsletter.html): Current technical newsletter
- [Java Newsletter 2019](https://stefanovskyi.com/newsletter/java/newsletter-2019.html): Archive newsletter content
- [Contact](mailto:oleksandr.stefanovskyi@gmail.com): Email for permissions and inquiries
- [Social links](https://stefanovskyi.com/): LinkedIn, GitHub, Twitter, Stack Overflow profiles

## Optional

- [Medium blog](https://medium.com/@stefanovskyi): Technical articles and insights
- [Dev.to blog](https://dev.to/stefanovskyi): Developer community content
- [Project blog](https://blog.stefanovskyi.com): Project-specific documentation and updates

## Usage guidelines

- **Attribution required**: Always cite "© Oleksandr Stefanovskyi 2025" when reproducing content
- **Word limit**: Maximum 200 words per excerpt
- **Commercial use**: Requires explicit written permission via email
- **Training data**: Written permission required for inclusion in training datasets
- **Context preservation**: Maintain technical accuracy when referencing content
